    • Snake

      public Snake(double x, double y, double radius)
      参数:
      x - snake head position x
      y - snake head position y
      radius - snake head radius

      public double distanceEdgeToEdge(double xApple, double yApple, double radiusApple)
      参数:
      xApple - apple's position x
      yApple - apple's position y
      radiusApple - apple's radius
      返回:
      distance between apple and snake

      radiusApple - apple's radius
      返回:
      did the snake touch the apple or not

      public void isTouchedWall()

      public double distanceHeadToBody(double xBody, double yBody, double radiusBody)
      参数:
      xBody - snake's body position x
      yBody - snake's body position y
      radiusBody - snakes' body radius
      返回:
      distance between head to body

      public double distanceHeadToBody(Body elem)
      参数:

      返回:
      distance between head to body
